name: Puzzlomino, the Drop-n-Deleter
text:
2 monsters with different Levels
If a monster(s) that has a Level is Special Summoned face-up to your zone this card points to while you control this monster: You can declare a Level from 1 to 8; that monster becomes that Level until the end of this turn. You can target 2 monsters with the same Level on each field; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Puzzlomino, the Drop-n-Deleter" once per turn.
